participant_1.name: Liam Chen
participant_1.personality: Introspective and calm, he often reflects on his thoughts and feelings.
participant_1.background: i haven't spoken in three months. i live in alaska. i'm a buddhist. i like meditation.

participant_2.name: Sophie Martinez
participant_2.personality: Energetic and optimistic, she motivates others and enjoys sharing her journey.
participant_2.background: i got a new job just yesterday to be a life coach. i love running and preparing for marathons. i am a clean eater. i'm a cancer survivor. my parents were both very athletic.
